articles.author: Samuel O'Brient
articles.title: General Motors’ robotaxi exit is a massive hit for tech leader - TheStreet
articles.description: This decision proves that hot new tech markets come with plenty of risk
articles.content:
The robotaxi market took a sharp turn this week as an industry leader made a shocking announcement. 
General Motors  (GM) , once hailed as a formidable rival for Tesla  (TSLA)  in the race to roll o… [+4551 chars]
